overview: At Mommy's Girl some of the freshest teens find new ways to entertain themselves with their nurturing stepmothers. Girls these days learn about sex everywhere, whether it's on TV, online or in magazines, but only one thing is certain. The only reliable way to get an A+ in sexual education is when it's hands on from an experienced nurturing and trustworthy older woman. These enlightening lessons just can't compare to those monkey see monkey do methods they see everywhere. Thankfully, redhead stepmoms Syren De Mer and Kendra James are well equipped to show their girls how to fit in with other budding teenagers at school. Their girls make sexual progress unrivaled by their biological mothered classmates. Ariella Ferrera, though a seasoned teacher in the tongue arts herself, is still surprised when her stepdaughter's friend Veronica shows her the newest technique in her arsenal which she calls squirting.
title: A Quick Learner & Other Stories
